page.title: 20Ashford Cattle Market
page.content: With access onto the Ring Road of Ashford stands an area used often as a cattle market. Local farmers and dealers bring their animals here to be sold by auction. Cattle, sheep and other farm animals are dealt with here. Many farmers and butchers bid secretly for groups of animals when they come up for sale. Once a year there is a Show when prizes are awarded for the best live specimens. Dead meat is on display and prizes are given for the best quality. The same site is used for car auctions. Anyone with a car to sell can ask to bring it there. The owners state a price that they would like. The auctioneer allows people to bid for each car as it is driven in.
